With the recent launch of Elden Ring Nightreign bringing a new co-op spin on FromSoftware's popular action RPG, some fans may be looking to revisit the setting of the original Elden Ring, the Lands Between. Luckily, a new volume of the official Elden Ring manga, The Road to the Erdtree Vol. 5, recently launched and is discounted to just $10.30 for a limited time. If you're already caught up, you can also preorder Volume 6 (releases July 22) and Volume 7 (releases October 28) for $13 apiece at Amazon--or, if you're new to the series and looking to start from the beginning, you can also grab the first four volumes, all of which are discounted at Amazon.

More From Software Manga and Graphic Novels

If you like Elden Ring, chances are you're probably a fan of From Software's other "Soulborne" games, many of which have their own books to check out.

Starting with Dark Souls, manga fans can pick up the first volume of the Dark Souls: Redemption manga series for $14. The series follows a woman and her warrior guardian as they journey through the undead world of the Dark Souls trilogy.

There is also the official Dark Souls graphic novel series, which has seen several volumes released over the years. You can grab the Dark Souls complete collection for $24.28 (was $35). This includes the first four volumes in a single paperback omnibus. There is also a box set that includes the first three volumes in the series that's available for $28.49 (was $50). You can also pick up each volume individually, including the latest entry in the Dark Souls graphic novel series, The Willow King.

For those who preder to read prose instead of comics, you can pick up Dark Souls: Masque of Vindication for $20.66 (was $25). The book comes from Yen Press, who are also publishing the Dark Souls: Redemption manga.

Dark Souls Books

  • Dark Souls: Redemption Vol. 1 - Humanity Lost (manga) -- $14
  • Dark Souls: The Complete Collection -- $24.28 ($35)
  • Dark Souls Graphic Novel Box Set (Volumes 1-3) -- $28.49 ($50)
  • Dark Souls Vol. 1: The Breath of Andolus -- $15.65 ($18)
  • Dark Souls Vol. 1: The Breath of Andolus - Artist's Edition -- $30
  • Dark Souls Vol. 2: Winter's Spite -- $16.79 ($18)
  • Dark Souls Vol. 3: Legends of the Flame -- $17.27 ($18)
  • Dark Souls Vol. 4: The Age of Fire -- $13.59 ($18)
  • Dark Souls Vol. 5: The Willow King -- $13.48 ($18)
  • Dark Souls: Masque of Vindication (prose) -- $20.66 ($25)

Bloodborne also has its own graphic novel series, and fans can grab various releases at discounts right now. The Bloodborne 1-3 Box Set is on sale for $28 (was $50) and is the best place to start for new readers. Volumes 4, 5, and 6 are also available individually, but are getting a box set next year that you can preorder now.

Bloodborne Graphic Novels

  • Bloodborne Vol. 1-3 Box Set -- $28 ($50)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 4-6: Box Set -- $50 | Releases October 14
  • Bloodborne Vol. 1: The Death of Sleep - Deluxe Edition (hardcover) -- $25 | Releases September 2025
  • Bloodborne Vol. 1: The Death of Sleep -- $13.59 ($18)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 2: The Healing Thirst -- $15.59 ($18)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 3: A Song of Crows -- $15.85 ($18)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 4: The Veil Torn Asunder -- $18
  • Bloodborne Vol. 5: Lady of the Lanterns -- $15.84 ($18)
  • Bloodborne Vol. 6: The Bleak Dominion -- $10.15 ($18)

Finally, Sekiro has its own side-story manga that tells the story of Hanbei the Undying--the stalwart warrior who players will recognize as the swordsman who teaches you how to use The One-Armed Wolf's various attacks and special moves.
